Tomato__Target_Spot: Apply Mancozeb or chlorothalonil fungicide weekly.
Tomato__Tomato_mosaic_virus: Remove infected plants. Disinfect tools. Use resistant varieties.
Tomato__Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus: Control whiteflies. Remove infected plants. Use resistant varieties.
Tomato_Bacterial_spot: Apply copper-based bactericides. Avoid overhead irrigation.
Tomato_Early_blight: Spray Mancozeb or chlorothalonil. Practice crop rotation.
Tomato_healthy: No disease detected. Maintain good plant care.
Tomato_Late_blight: Apply chlorothalonil or copper fungicide. Avoid wet foliage.
Tomato_Leaf_Mold: Ensure good ventilation. Apply copper fungicide if necessary.
Tomato_Septoria_leaf_spot: Remove infected leaves. Apply fungicide such as chlorothalonil.
Tomato_Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider_m: Spray insecticidal soap or neem oil weekly.
Potato___Early_blight: Spray Mancozeb fungicide every 7 to 10 days.
Tomato__Other: General care: Remove infected parts, improve ventilation, apply appropriate treatment.
